availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edwin F. Corey, Jr. (New York City Notary)

body.p: New York City, New York notary and commissioner. New York native. Married to Margaret Corey. Father of George H. Corey. Notary in New York City in 1860. Commissioner of Deeds for the Commonwealth of Kentucky in New York in 1864.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, New York, New York City, Ward 7, District 2, p. 81; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, New York, New York City, Ward 12, District 15, p. 29; Index to New York City Deaths 1862-1948. Indices prepared by the Italian Genealogical Group and the German Genealogy Group, and used with permission of the New York City Department of Records/Municipal Archives, Certificate#15191.
